title: Zachary Levi: ON Growing from Depression, Anxiety, and Mental Health
description: On this week's episode, Shazam’s Zachary Levi opens up like never before.He shares his personal struggles with depression, anxiety and mental health as well as how meditation, prayer, and therapy have helped him grow from it all.If you are going through a tough time, this episode will help you shift your mindset and trust that, as cliche, as it sounds, everything happens for a reason.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
